basic_information.scholarship_name: The Honorable Lance & Lori Robertson Endowed Scholarship in Public Administration

description: This scholarship was established by UCO Distinguished Alumnus Lance Robertson and his wife, Lori Robertson, to help UCO graduate students successfully transition into public service. This scholarship recognizes a Master of Public Administration student who shows exceptional passion, vision and commitment for service with a demonstrated strong academic record and financial need. In addition to financial support, the recipient is also offered mentorship hours with the Robertsons. Eligibility Requirements Graduate student in the MPA program Preference for a student working at least part-time Graduate GPA of 2.5 or higher Recommendation from a faculty member One page essay demonstrating the student's fit for the scholarship, financial need and future goals of serving in a public administration capacity Preference may be given to previous recipients
